mapper.sql: a.user_id AS "user.id", a.shop_id AS "shopId", a.tid AS "tid", a.numiid AS "numiid", a.sku_id AS "skuId", a.created_time AS "createdTime", a.title AS "title", a.brand AS "brand", a.goods_nbr AS "goodsNbr", a.goods_size AS "goodsSize", a.goods_count AS "goodsCount", a.goods_price AS "goodsPrice", a.goods_price_org AS "goodsPriceOrg", a.cust_name AS "custName", a.cust_addr AS "custAddr", a.cust_tel AS "custTel", a.ems_comp AS "emsComp", a.ems_price AS "emsPrice", a.remark_buy AS "remarkBuy", a.remark_sell AS "remarkSell", a.remark_color AS "remarkColor", a.download_time AS "downloadTime", a.buyer_nick AS "buyerNick", a.is_export AS "isExport", a.is_fahuo AS "isFahuo", a.ems_id AS "emsId", a.error_msg AS "errorMsg", a.channel_name AS "channelName", a.kefu_user_name AS "kefuUserName", a.goods_type_name AS "goodsTypeName", a.sex AS "sex", a.goods_size_trans AS "goodsSizeTrans", a.state AS "state", a.order_remark AS "orderRemark", a.origin AS "origin", a.batch_id AS "batchId", a.order_id AS "orderId", a.province_id AS "provinceId", a.city_name AS "cityName", a.city_id AS "cityId", a.country_name AS "countryName", a.country_id AS "countryId", a.province_name AS "provinceName", a.ems_comp_ori AS "emsCompOri", a.taobao_order_price AS "taobaoOrderPrice", a.post_fee AS "postFee", a.order_sum_price AS "orderSumPrice", a.total_fee AS "totalFee", a.adjust_fee AS "adjustFee", a.part_mjz_discount AS "partMjzDiscount", a.divide_order_fee AS "divideOrderFee", a.payment AS "payment", a.price AS "price", a.discount_fee AS "discountFee", a.logistics_type AS "logisticsType", u1.name AS "user.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u1 ON u1.id = a.user_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM fx_orders_taobao a
AND a.title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' '%'+#{title}+'%' concat('%',#{title},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fx_orders_taobao( user_id, shop_id, tid, numiid, sku_id, created_time, title, brand, goods_nbr, goods_size, goods_count, goods_price, goods_price_org, cust_name, cust_addr, cust_tel, ems_comp, ems_price, remark_buy, remark_sell, remark_color, download_time, buyer_nick, is_export, is_fahuo, ems_id, error_msg, channel_name, kefu_user_name, goods_type_name, sex, goods_size_trans, state, order_remark, origin, batch_id, order_id, province_id, city_name, city_id, country_name, country_id, province_name, ems_comp_ori, taobao_order_price, post_fee, order_sum_price, total_fee, adjust_fee, part_mjz_discount, divide_order_fee, payment, price, discount_fee, logistics_type ) VALUES ( #{user.id}, #{shopId}, #{tid}, #{numiid}, #{skuId}, #{createdTime}, #{title}, #{brand}, #{goodsNbr}, #{goodsSize}, #{goodsCount}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsPriceOrg}, #{custName}, #{custAddr}, #{custTel}, #{emsComp}, #{emsPrice}, #{remarkBuy}, #{remarkSell}, #{remarkColor}, #{downloadTime}, #{buyerNick}, #{isExport}, #{isFahuo}, #{emsId}, #{errorMsg}, #{channelName}, #{kefuUserName}, #{goodsTypeName}, #{sex}, #{goodsSizeTrans}, #{state}, #{orderRemark}, #{origin}, #{batchId}, #{orderId}, #{provinceId}, #{cityName}, #{cityId}, #{countryName}, #{countryId}, #{provinceName}, #{emsCompOri}, #{taobaoOrderPrice}, #{postFee}, #{orderSumPrice}, #{totalFee}, #{adjustFee}, #{partMjzDiscount}, #{divideOrderFee}, #{payment}, #{price}, #{discountFee}, #{logisticsType} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fx_orders_taobao SET user_id = #{user.id}, shop_id = #{shopId}, tid = #{tid}, numiid = #{numiid}, sku_id = #{skuId}, created_time = #{createdTime}, title = #{title}, brand = #{brand}, goods_nbr = #{goodsNbr}, goods_size = #{goodsSize}, goods_count = #{goodsCount}, goods_price = #{goodsPrice}, goods_price_org = #{goodsPriceOrg}, cust_name = #{custName}, cust_addr = #{custAddr}, cust_tel = #{custTel}, ems_comp = #{emsComp}, ems_price = #{emsPrice}, remark_buy = #{remarkBuy}, remark_sell = #{remarkSell}, remark_color = #{remarkColor}, download_time = #{downloadTime}, buyer_nick = #{buyerNick}, is_export = #{isExport}, is_fahuo = #{isFahuo}, ems_id = #{emsId}, error_msg = #{errorMsg}, channel_name = #{channelName}, kefu_user_name = #{kefuUserName}, goods_type_name = #{goodsTypeName}, sex = #{sex}, goods_size_trans = #{goodsSizeTrans}, state = #{state}, order_remark = #{orderRemark}, origin = #{origin}, batch_id = #{batchId}, order_id = #{orderId}, province_id = #{provinceId}, city_name = #{cityName}, city_id = #{cityId}, country_name = #{countryName}, country_id = #{countryId}, province_name = #{provinceName}, ems_comp_ori = #{emsCompOri}, taobao_order_price = #{taobaoOrderPrice}, post_fee = #{postFee}, order_sum_price = #{orderSumPrice}, total_fee = #{totalFee}, adjust_fee = #{adjustFee}, part_mjz_discount = #{partMjzDiscount}, divide_order_fee = #{divideOrderFee}, payment = #{payment}, price = #{price}, discount_fee = #{discountFee}, logistics_type = #{logisticsType} WHERE id = #{id}
